website_summaries.verdict: Venum's Contender boxing gloves are designed for extended use and offer excellent padding and support for general training and sparring.
pros: Well-designed women's boxing gloves that wear well
Easy to put on and remove
Visually striking and fashionable gloves that offer top protection
cons: Seams have a tendency to unravel for some users

customer_reviews.title: The inner lining has begun to fall apart after 5 or 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I waited about six months before reviewing these, which I feel is the responsible thing to do as an informative reviewer. At first, I would have given these five stars, but they begin to fall apart (only on the inside though). regardless, I'm still using them. I punch very hard, and these guys offer enough protection. The fit is snug, and the overall design is perfect - there are no strange spaces inside the glove so your hand fits in very well. Unfortunately, Venum should invest in some slightly better lining for the inside. Otherwise, this would have been a five-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Six Legged Freak

customer_reviews.title: Get the Elites
customer_reviews.text: These are entry-level gloves from a major brand. They look very cool, but they lack padding and any meaningful ventilation. My knuckles were taking quite a beating from even not that intense work. I had to return them and get the Elite version. The Elites turned out to be twice as expensive, but also twice better with respect to padding, wrist support, and ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Rosomax

customer_reviews.title: Mine Must've Been Made on Friday Afternoon!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for combatives sparring and working a heavy bag. The price was good, the brand is well known, and they look pretty cool too. They arrived, and I strapped them on and beat on my heavy bag for a while. I'm very happy with the padding and the fit. The only gripe? The VENUM patch on the strap was installed upside down on one of the gloves. Took me a while to notice it, so it's not a glaring issue. But for the price I paid, it doesn't bother me. And if my opponent notices, it just means I'm not hitting him hard enough :)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boxing gloves. I am a 5'3" 125lb woman who hits the bag really hard so these are great as far as padding and support for my wrist. I do end up looking a little like wreck it Ralph bc they are wider than my other gloves, but my other gloves aren't nearly as comfy as these so it doesn't bother me. I get compliments all the time on them and will definitely buy another when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Puggers27

customer_reviews.title: Decent starter gloves
customer_reviews.text: I just recently got into Muay Thai. I wanted to save money on gear so I went with venum over other brands. These gloves are okay. Other reviews say the stitching rips fast. Mine hasn't yet but I'm sure it will soon. They feel cheap. I'll probably just spend the extra $20-40 next time and go with a more expensive glove from a better brand. If you are just starting and wanna save go with these over Walmart gloves
customer_reviews.author: Alex Billos

customer_reviews.title: I love my shin guards and my other products
customer_reviews.text: I have bought most of my fight and training equipment from Venum, I love my shin guards and my other products. I really loved how these gloves fit and everything about them, but my right glove's inner seam near the inner wrist burst and the stuffing is coming out. I baby my gloves and I only wear them when i'm hitting, so i'm frustrated i've only had these less than a month and there's already a huge hole right at the seam. I need steady gloves for my fight in the fall and i'm bummed these didn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: D Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! I use them for training against heavy, double end and wrecking-ball bags. I have not used them for sparring or anything like that, but I am optimistic that they would hold up well in the ring. I've used them several hours a week for several months and there are no signs of flaws, tears or weak spots. They feel solid and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: G. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Small fingerbox
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to be made of a good quality material, but the shape of them just did not fit my hands. The fingerbox is very small, so my fingers didn't fit in the gloves right, causing my hands to be held open and the padding to be placed over my 2nd knuckle/finger joint instead of right over my knuckles like it should have been. Very difficult to punch correctly with these. I also found them very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The fit is a little small. It works, but there's not much room after you wrap your hands. The padding isn't very thick, I can definitely feel it after a good heavy bag workout. Not bad for an extra pait of gloves, I just use them for drilling and sparring and a different pair for heavy bags.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves For Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are perfect for a beginner who is just learning boxing, kickboxing, MMA, or Muay Thai. They offer decent cushioning and are easy to put on and take off because of the Velcro strap. The price is excellent too. I’d highly recommend these gloves to a beginner who isn’t sure if they wanna train seriously or not because they price is low enough not to take a huge financial hit. The quality is good enough to last a beginner until they decide if they wanna stick to fighting or not. Good gloves sold at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Hermès Trismegistus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved these gloves and just what I expected. I will update later when I get a feel from them in action. Through my gloves on the seam there was extra threading. It didn't look like the gloves are defected but if they begin to unravel within the first couple days of using I would contact the seller and rant.
customer_reviews.author: Maira

customer_reviews.title: There are better gloves out there for less cost
customer_reviews.text: There are better gloves out there for less cost, or spend little more and get a far higher quality glove. The palm section in size/spacing, does not match the hand size/spacing section. Meaning- if you have a large hand, the palm section will fit nicely and the fingertips may be more cramped. Similarly, if you have a small, the fingertip section will fit snug and the palm section will be too large. Must wear wraps with these gloves. The wrist wrap section does not take into account for small wrists so does not close tight enough without major overlapping of glove flaps. Everest better quality and make for same, if not lower, cost.
customer_reviews.author: monique

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good glove
customer_reviews.text: The inside fit is fairly large but I think is pretty standard, so I wear a pair of padded inner glove/wrist wraps under these and do well with them. I didn't know much about gloves when I ordered as all I do is classes at the gym so I went off of my weight and ordered the 16oz. I feel like there is adequate amount of padding for my hands especially with the wraps underneath.
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously nice.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite marvel villain venom which means I had to get these. I see pros use it...it must be good. And it is. After nearly breaking my wrist with the crap everlast sent with their 100 pound bag it was clear I needed something better. 2 days later Venum!! I was so happy to go all out and make proper hooks. I lost weight using this everyday for at least 30 mins just remember to take that water break and limit sun/heat exposure it's been hot y'all.
customer_reviews.author: Mangoicetea92

customer_reviews.title: Decent looking gloves but performance laking
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look awesome but the fit around the knuckles is loose and I have extra large hands and wraps. For simple trainings or workouts for ladies or smaller guys these might work because they give you good wrist support. But for heavy handed power punching men these glove seriously lack in cushion around the knuckles, you'll feel irritation as your hand slides around in the glove on that thin pad for big hits
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boxing gloves. I previously only bought Title 1s but these were cheap and I needed something quick. I’ve been using them for a couple of months now and they still look pretty new. Either I’ve gotten weaker since my previous pair or these are pretty durable. I usually go through a pair every 12-18 months. May update in a few more months.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: I use these for boxing training, and they are comfortable, protective, and durable. They stand up to the heavy bag well, and I have not had any issues with them. I would recommend them to newer boxers.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Spend a bit more money better ones.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been training muay Thai for a few months. These are the first gloves I've ever bought. For the most part I had no complaints until the inside started to rip open. My fingers can touch the padding and now I think I almost hate them. I kept them dry and only used them two times a week. I don't recommend to anyone. Other than that the fit isn't what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable gloves, great for beginner
customer_reviews.text: I use these for Muay Thai training- I definitely have to wrap my hands underneath them, and as a woman with little hands I will be looking for my next pair of gloves to be made for smaller hands, as I find the thumb part sticks out a little too far and I have to really power it down to make a fist. But overall I have been using at least twice a week for 4-5 months and they are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Haynes

customer_reviews.title: VENUM Boxing Gloves for the Martial Artist
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pairs of these Venum boxing gloves, one for my husband and one for my son. The guys are experienced mixed martial artists who are now tackling the art of Krav Maga, a more offensive art than the previous courses they have completed. The Krav Maga instructor not only approved these gloves, but said we received an exceptional discount from Amazon Prime. Thanks, Amazon, for making these late Xmas surprises such a hit.
customer_reviews.author: lbeck

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: My husband Ill say "soft boxes" with one of his friends for a good workout and because boys are boys. He loves these gloves and even though he's not a pro the confidence he gets from wearing them sure make him look like one.
customer_reviews.author: Prophet

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been beating the heck out of these for months now, and they seem to be holding up just fine. I hit a 100 lb. bag HARD, and paired with some classic wraps my hands stay intact. Extra wide wrist strap provides ample support. Don't expect a high end Hayabusa, but these seem to get the job done and then some. Thanks Venum!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Waite

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: They do what they need to do, but the quality is maybe only a half step above a cheap pair of Everlasts. Nothing about them makes them stand out, except the styling and the fact that they're not Everlast. Weight and fit is ok. My next set will probably be Ringside.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are some nice gloves they are the perfect weight and protect my bands very well when I am punching the bag. They are holding up really well so far and they don't smell like my previous ones did. They fit my hands really good too. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian young

customer_reviews.title: High quality upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to these gloves from my thin Everlast ones and I love them. Extra cushion over the knuckles that stops my hand bleeds. I will most likely go with Venus for shin guards in the future
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME! The perfect amount of support, and they look good too! They have great cusion, as I had previously injured my hand. I also love that they wrap around the wrist as added support. They look fierce, but add a touch of femininity, tough but classy! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rye

customer_reviews.title: Still pretty new, but so far...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten to use them a whole lot at this point in time. However, so far they have been comfortable. No wear and tear yet, which isn't saying much since I have only owned them for about a week...
customer_reviews.author: Casey Rusher

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart....with a quickness
customer_reviews.text: I bought these roughly a month ago. I put 20hrs of time in, sparring and bag work using these gloves, they were well cared for, cleaned and stored correctly. All of that care and lite use, did nothing for the longevity of the gloves. Both gloves began shedding their skin rather quickly, a first slowly, and then in chunks. Ive bought and used a lot of gloves these have hands down been the most disappointing. Not even a month of use.....
customer_reviews.author: Jens

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought the gloves 4 months ago. Great fit and weight. Down side is the velcro straps. Velcro on left glove has failed. I kickbox 4 times per week for 30 minutes each time. loved the gloves until velcro failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Meverden

customer_reviews.title: 16 oz is heavy for a person of average size
customer_reviews.text: These are still lasting me and I have had them a couple years; I love them! if you are small like 5'7 120, they are heavy even if you are in good shape with good upper body strength probably get the smaller sizes
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves. I will buy these again if I ever wear them out.
customer_reviews.text: Very good gloves. Have been using them for five months now. I have no complaints. Well made and comfortable. The gym I box at has quite a few toes of heavy bags and these gloves do well with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product when done right.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 12oz and somehow got a 10oz and a 12oz. Only just notice. Size isn’t so different that it’s very obvious but it is a little annoying. Great gloves otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: These fit very nice, and seem to be sturdy. Although they will get minimum use. We purchased them to just work out with and do play sparing matches. I'm sure they will hold up for quit awhile.
customer_reviews.author: C. John Buchanan Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Love gloves
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to wrap your hands well and get the thicker gloves for extra protection. Love these gloves all around.
customer_reviews.author: SassyMoonGlow

customer_reviews.title: Came back for another pair!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair! I bought myself a pair about two years ago and just bought a pair for my father in law. They feel great and are very durable. I workout on a variety of punching bags and these have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce T.

customer_reviews.title: Get the right fit
customer_reviews.text: These boxing glove fit great and they performs well when i workout with my punching bag even tho there new after each used i put fabric softener sheets in each one to keep them smelling fresh venum🥊💯🥊
customer_reviews.author: ChevyMan97

customer_reviews.title: Good for starting out
customer_reviews.text: Been using for to months in a beginner cardio kickboxing class. They're holding up good and have decent ventilation
customer_reviews.author: Kailey Galanis

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and it was nice to find gloves this small (8 oz) in stock
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and it was nice to find gloves this small (8 oz) in stock. They fit like well... what they are (gloves) My kiddo has pretty small hands but says they fit comfortably and loves sparring in them.
customer_reviews.author: Perla

customer_reviews.title: Decent Glove
customer_reviews.text: A decent glove but unfortunately the glove and my hand were not a great fit. After a few weeks of heavy bag work the inside stitching started to unravel and now I'm just waiting for the day that they will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them in our kickboxing class they are a popular glove although the studio sells their own for 16oz gloves for $60 these are cheaper and work just as good they look nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Fedora Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 yr old for his boxing class. Looks likes nice material and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Cau H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for about a month with few practices a week but it feels great. I think I'll be able to get at least half a year out of this even with intense use. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Noit terrible. Probably best for casual users.
customer_reviews.text: These held up alright for awhile, but my bf has had them under a year and they are falling apart. He is an mma fighter, so these get regular, heavy use, but most of his gloves last about 2 years, so these are disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: e1n2m3

customer_reviews.title: One punch knockout!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality gloves for a good price. For training these gloves are perfect.i like that they have several color options. I bought a pair for me and my kids. The kids loved them too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Huard

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: They last about 4 months if you hit hard and use them for about 4 hours a week. Overall they're nice gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are great boxing gloves! Nice pair I bought so far without breaking the bank. Weight is 10oz which is perfect for me to work the bag..
customer_reviews.author: ShumaiLY

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fit
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look and feel great, perfect for my daughter who just started boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Hiyakitten

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner gloves.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of boxing gloves and I recommend for anyone who is just trying out boxing.
customer_reviews.author: seattleWitcher

customer_reviews.title: They’re a HIT !
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ! It came in the exact time I needed. Exceeded any and all expectations. I will be telling everyone about this. This truly made my day. Thank you for being here to provide me with a slice of happiness :)
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, comfy and not girly
customer_reviews.text: Because not all girls want to use pink and purple stuff (and I do, but not for my boxing gloves), these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: F. MURIEL

customer_reviews.title: Good Affordable Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bough these to replace a cheap set of Everlast gloves I got as part of a starter kit I got from a heavy bag set. I was looking for something that was cheap that would also last for a while. These had pretty good reviews so I thought I would give it a try. Overall quality is pretty good. Good padding overall, no funny smells, and works as expected. These a definitely and upgrade over my old gloves. Take a look at the attached pics to see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: lamchops_sf

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and well reinforced
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9, 175lbs, I am using the 14oz one for a kickboxing class. Works great and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: lordhades

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! They are very comfortable, durable and the logo is badass!!
customer_reviews.author: Proper Eli

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: i bought these because the pair i bought at the local sports store went the right size (14oz) this venum pair is very comfortable and doesn't have that tough velcro they scratched my sparring partners
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Little man with big gloves
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed these gloves as an upgrade for my 2nd grader. He would complain of hand pain after bag sessions with the 6 oz'ers he was using. Now he uses these Venums with the Ringside gel wraps underneath. No more hand soreness and the other boys appreciate the added padding and weight when he spars them. The only knock is that he complains that he can't make a solid fist in these gloves, so I think there is a break in period due to his smaller hands. Overall, solid construction, and stylish looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit my hands perfectly. I have been using them to learn boxing from my personal trainer. They are holding up well under pretty intense use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting some boxing training and these gloves work well for me
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Tacoronte

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Gotta break them in. Once ur done breaking them in they feel really good
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Decent Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are solid gloves. good comfortable fit. We use these in my buddy's home MMA gym. They get used a lot by some heavy hitters. They are replacing some real leather old-school gloves that began to fall apart. I liked them so much I bought a pair for my basement BJJ/MMA/grappling gym.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McDermitt

customer_reviews.title: Loving purple
customer_reviews.text: Love them they fit perfect & definitely comfortable and I’m in love with the color
customer_reviews.author: ThyckGirlCurvze

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has been using these for over 2 years and still loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Julia G.

customer_reviews.title: Great shipping time and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gloves on Saturday January 13th and got them Monday January 15th and they fit perfectly, i love them and can't wait to put them to good use
customer_reviews.author: Justin Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: These are great beginners gloves or decent bag gloves for someone that’s on a budget or just getting into combat sports or a good cardio workout.
customer_reviews.author: Ian valentin

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: These are good gloves , they are not for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Alex Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and I love them. I tried them on and talk about comfortable! I go to my boxing class tonight and I am beyond excited! The blue is extremely accurate and now I know my hands will be protected when I am hitting that bag. Even when these start to ware down I am going to buy another pair asap.
customer_reviews.author: Ladina

customer_reviews.title: the best. I bought these thinking the same
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Venum tech gloves that were 30 dollars more a year ago,the best. I bought these thinking the same,but the contenders sucks. 1. They are hard. the padding is too condense. 2. the thumb placement sucks. everytime I hit the bag, my thumb hits.
customer_reviews.author: boxer

customer_reviews.title: Kickboxing Wonder Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Got these gloves this week and had it tested yesterday at my kickboxing class at the local UFC gym. It's comfortable and the fit is perfect. As for its quality/made, it seems to be made of high quality materials and the color is even all over the product. I had an Everlast gloves before this and this is by far better than those Everlast gloves. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Greggy Garsuta

customer_reviews.title: Go with something a bit better and save the hassle
customer_reviews.text: Padding on the gloves were in a weird spot. Hurt my hands when I punched with them on the heavy bags. Ended up going with a fairtex that was a bit more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my boyfriend and he love them. He had them for a while now and there still going strong. I love the color and the design. It is also a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: shondell hinds

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent gloves for the price. Had to exchange the first set I got in due to the stitching. So far the replacement has been good. Great for the price point. You can expect to pay more for higher quality gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Naseem

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: it's not expensive gloves but it's comfy and well protects your wrist and hands while boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: So far after 4-5 months they have held up well for a beginner. I use them 3-4 times a week for a cardio kickboxing class. They do get super sweaty on the inside but this my first pair of boxing gloves so I have nothing to compare against. But they are very comfortable. I get lots of compliments on the look of the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: brittny jordan

customer_reviews.title: Solid Boxing Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I like these gloves. They're my first pair so I don't have much to compare them to but they work well. Fit mostly snug to me and overall good gloves for the price. Pretty dense and nice padding inside, some holes for breathability. Can be a bit solid for a beginner until knuckles and hands are conditioned. Overall good for price.
customer_reviews.author: Natro Strap Whip

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these gloves as an extra pair for sparring. The gloves are incredibly stiff and have little padding, They might be good for hitting mitts and drills but for nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love the different color combos was looking for another pair and found an exact match on here
customer_reviews.author: Girlzero08

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them for 4 months. I love my gloves.
customer_reviews.author: EVA

customer_reviews.title: ... had it for a week and it has a great fit, feels like decent material and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a week and it has a great fit, feels like decent material and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanpaul

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection, Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product offers a lot of protection for your hands and wrists. It especially offers a lot of protection for the bottom side of your wrists for when you are practicing with a partner. There is a lot of padding to protect you from your partner’s punches. They are also so comfortable and fit great. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for great quality, nice fit, for a resonable price then consider these gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, gloves are very comfortable and look really nice as well. The materials and the build quality seem great. Have used Everlast and Title and this ones feel much better. Got them a few months ago and so far they are holding up, but there is some normal tear and wear. Strap holds in place really well.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a week and they are great gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Asheik

customer_reviews.title: Inside rip off after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: After 2 uses the interior of the glove rip off , really disappointing because was my first pair of gloves, im not in the us and is very difficult for me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E. Lopez Archila

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color in grey
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves. He recently joined mma training and said these provide way more cushion than the ones the gym lends to kids that dont have or forget their gloves. Great stitching and seem solid for the bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Peacoat Rider

customer_reviews.title: Not for intermediate or above
customer_reviews.text: I do bag work 4-5 days a week. After about a month the glove is pretty worn. Not very durable and I've felt better gloves for this price
customer_reviews.author: Big Tex Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE! Of course you can't go wrong with Venum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: They look great! Holding up so far and good for training . No complaints here
customer_reviews.author: AlmightyAfro

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size..... this is my 2nd pair of Venoms and I can't even use them. Everything about them is a full size small than my 1st pair... The strap doesn't close around my lower arms, my hands have no room inside the gloves and worst of all it taken 2 people just to get my hands into them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift for a friend and fits him perfectly
customer_reviews.author: DWheeler

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The seams in the inside of the glove broke. The stitching is cheaply made. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: click

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight, these gloves can take a good amount of use. Great for boxing and very bright vivid colors!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect. I bought a10oz for myself I'm 5'2 & 140lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sheera

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fingers broke through the lining one second use. Still perfectly usable though.
customer_reviews.author: jessonthebeach

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this isn't five stars is because the white color gets stained very easily. What we color you're punching comes off on the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Overall very comfortable and good quality gloves. Have had mine for about 2 years and have been holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Venom is a great brand. For the price these are probably the best you could buy. Great for beginners and training work. Can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Buche

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, they feel like toys
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, they feel like toys. They have no ventilation and fit loose in some places and tight in others. I have a pair of Everlast gloves that were the same price and the quality is far superior. Would not purchase this brand again, which is too bad because they look really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Ready to box
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were the best investment for me. Comfortable, durable and great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Mendoza Fam

customer_reviews.title: yah
customer_reviews.text: A bit big for me wee little hands. But definitely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gloves.  No electronics. Go punch the bag!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality gloves. Boxing gloves makes one put the electronics down and get some exercise & skill. Go punch the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Twinzmom

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I liked these gloves a lot when I first got them ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I liked these gloves a lot when I first got them but I’ve had them for four months now the palm side of the gloves are falling apart bad. I can see my hands through the seems. I sweat a lot so that doesn’t exactly help but still. After only four months these won’t last too much longer
customer_reviews.author: Lance Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new Venum contender boxing gloves - 16OZ. First Impressions - Well Built, great smell for synthetic leather and very comfortable. Will update as I put these gloves through their paces.
customer_reviews.author: Ayeza A.

product_meta.title: Venum Contender Boxing Gloves
product_meta.description: The Venum Contender Boxing Gloves are made to withstand the toughest of bag or body shots. Made with a multi-density foam padding absorbs shock with each strike. Large Velcro strap for enclosure ensures a secure fit and provides protection to the wrist to minimize the risk of injury during training. Finished off with added Venum logo accents to the outer. Perfect for training, sparring, bag or mitt work.
feature_bullets: 100% high quality synthetic leather for extended service life
Multi-density foam for perfect absorption of shocks
Large Velcro enclosure for a secure fit
Full attached thumb to minimize the risk of twisting
